metadata.title: CVE-2022-4176 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: Out of bounds write in Lacros Graphics in Google Chrome on Chrome OS andLacros prior to 108.0.5359.71 allowed a remote attacker who convinced auser to engage in specific UI interactions to potentially exploit heapcorruption via UI interactions. (Chromium security severity: High)

criterions.comment: chromium-browser: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
